issue.title: Relation between move/swap concepts and Regular

discussion.p: I've been thinking about rearranging these things:

ol.li: Have a 'move equivalent' version of Regular/SemiRegular.

discussion.p: The reason for 2 is I expect for many people (it has been for me) Regular will be their standard concept to use for "types which are normal / sensible". The fact you can't sort a Regular type (as it isn't Swappable) seems a bit bizarre.
